resources.string: Are you sure you want to remove the password
Invalid name. Enter a valid save name.
Enter your password to enter the application.
Create a password to enter the application. You can change the password later, as long as you don\'t forget it. If you forget it, you will have to delete all data, losing all saved passwords!
Incorrect password. Enter the password correctly.
Select one or more boxes above.
Tap the biometric sensor to enter the app.
Be careful, if you forget your password you will not be able to access the data saved in the application!
It is not possible to save an empty password
No password saved, click the button below to create one.

A zip file will be created in the “Documents” folder on your internal storage. In this file there will be a text file containing the encryption password for your database. Be very careful because with this file anyone can access all your passwords, keep it in a safe place. If you lose your encryption key, you will no longer be able to access your saved passwords. Are you sure you want to export your passwords?
To restore your passwords click the button below and look for your backup file. Its name was originally \"simple_password_db_backup.zip\".

Click confirm below to begin restoring the backup. After the operation you will see a confirmation message. If completed successfully, simply return to the main screen and your data will appear automatically. Any currently saved password will be overwritten by the backup. If you cancel nothing will change.
Permission denied. This permission is required to make or restore backups. Grant it to proceed.
Invalid file. Select the correct backup file.
